title: Easy throw it all in vegetable lasagne
ingredients: ['1 garlic clove, finely chopped', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 carrot, peeled and diced', '1 red pepper, chopped', '1 small tin sweetcorn, drained, or use frozen sweetcorn', '1/2 tin kidney beans, drained', '1 tablespoon tomato puree', '1 tin chopped tomatoes', '1 tablespoon dried Italian herbs', '1/2 tablespoon chilli powder, or more to taste', '1 jar white sauce', '9 no cook dried lasagne sheets', 'grated cheese']
